Package akkre.ariessentials

Class LocalizationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • akkre.ariessentials.LocalizationHelper
  • public class LocalizationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class that will make using the localization file more convient. This isn't quite necessary for the tutorial and you can ignore it until you feel there is a need for it. (Episode 2)

    • Method Detail

      • getLocalizedString

        public static java.lang.String getLocalizedString​(java.lang.String key)
        The main function of this class, called by all the others. I don't recommend calling this elsewhere unless you have a single oddball key to use.
        Parameters:
        key - The key for the localization file.
        Returns:
        The localized String, if there is one. Otherwise, the key is returned. Whitespace is trimmed.

      • getMiscText

        public static java.lang.String getMiscText​(java.lang.String key)
        Gets a localization that has the "misc" prefix.
        Parameters:
        key - The key for the localization. For example, "PressShift" will get "misc.tutorialmod:PressShift".
        Returns:
        The localized String, if there is one. Otherwise, the key is returned.

      • getBlockDescription

        public static java.lang.String getBlockDescription​(java.lang.String blockName,
                                                   int index)
        Gets a description key for a block. The actual key will be something like "tile.tutorialmod:blockName.desc", plus a number if index is greater than 0.
        Parameters:
        blockName - The unlocalized name of the block, preferably straight from the Names class.
        index - The description index. If you want the "desc" key, use 0. For "desc1", use 1. For "desc2", use 2, etc.
        Returns:
        The localized String, if there is one. Otherwise, the key is returned.

      • getBlockKey

        public static java.lang.String getBlockKey​(java.lang.String blockName,
                                           java.lang.String key)
        Gets a localization for a block subkey. The localization you get will be for "tile.tutorialmod:blockName.key".
        Parameters:
        blockName - The unlocalized name of the block, preferably straight from the Names class.
        key - The subkey to get.
        Returns:
        The localized String, if there is one. Otherwise, the key is returned.

      • getItemDescription

        public static java.lang.String getItemDescription​(java.lang.String itemName,
                                                  int index)
        Gets a description key for an item. The actual key will be something like "item.tutorialmod:itemName.desc", plus a number if index is greater than 0.
        Parameters:
        itemName - The unlocalized name of the item, preferably straight from the Names class.
        index - The description index. If you want the "desc" key, use 0. For "desc1", use 1. For "desc2", use 2, etc.
        Returns:
        The localized String, if there is one. Otherwise, the key is returned.

      • getItemKey

        public static java.lang.String getItemKey​(java.lang.String itemName,
                                          java.lang.String key)
        Gets a localization for an item subkey. The localization you get will be for "item.tutorialmod:itemName.key".
        Parameters:
        itemName - The unlocalized name of the item, preferably straight from the Names class.
        key - The subkey to get.
        Returns:
        The localized String, if there is one. Otherwise, the key is returned.
